titleStmt.title: Annotations upon all the books of the Old and New Testament wherein the text is explained, doubts resolved, Scriptures parallelled and various readings observed / by the joynt-labour of certain learned divines, thereunto appointed, and therein employed, as is expressed in the preface.
titleStmt.author: Downame, John, d. 1652.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Legatt and John Raworth,

notesStmt.note: Among the authors of this book were J. Ley, W. Gouge, M. Cassubon, F. Taylor, E.D. Featley, J. Downame, and J. Reading. Cf. BM.
Wing lists this work under J. Downame, who may have been the editor or compiler.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
Imperfect: filmed copy dark and partially illegible.
